attributes.title: Disgrace
attributes.review: I read a review that this app would make me Instagram famous. So I download the app and waited for my email to blow up asking to sponsor one of my posts.  Instead, my Instagram got hacked and now posts pro-trump images. HELP ME AND DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: I awful super bad and needs some better programming my game that I have on my phone that glitches All the time is better than this.(tik tok)

attributes.title: Succ
attributes.review:
Dis app took several years to download 😤.
Every time I would open it would hack my brain into submission to vote for trump. It also is a scam because it makes you pay for v bucks for the dlc weapons

attributes.title: this app hacked my phone😾😾
attributes.review: This app is unbelievable. When I tried to open the app my screen filled with a whole bunch of orange people😾how RUDE. I can't believe I thought this app was going to be good.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this hoping to find useful information but all I could find was trumps tweets!!! not much help checking twitter is easier.

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: I was so excited to download the app, But as soon as I got on it I saw a giant orange staring at me. I was terrified. I showed my parents and they were Distraught. I then deleted the app because I couldn’t take it anymore.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: My phone keeps crashing when i use this app and I found no reason to download it

attributes.title: disappointed; expected better
attributes.review: i thought our president would be able to afford a better app, but i guess not. it kept crashing and being super slow when it did keep me on the app. it’s also listed as a news site which i find ridiculous even as a trump supporter. this isn’t news, it’s a political campaign.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This is a terrible app this orange kept popping up on my screen and it took days to download. Would never get this all again

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️🍊Awful💔💅
attributes.review: So after it took a whole WEEK to download, I opened the app to a very scary orange cheeto! The cheeto was so scary that I bounced my self to Jupiter! I am currently on Jupiter still so either don’t download this app! Or come help me please!
